source: FixOps Spotlight derived from public vendor advisories

records.title: XZ Utils Backdoor in liblzma
records.description: A malicious backdoor introduced into liblzma releases 5.6.0 and 5.6.1 allows remote unauthenticated code execution via SSH when the compromised compression library is used.

records.title: Palo Alto PAN-OS GlobalProtect Command Injection
records.description: An unauthenticated command injection in the GlobalProtect portal of PAN-OS allows network-based attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected firewalls.

records.title: Progress MOVEit Transfer SQL Injection
records.description: Progress MOVEit Transfer contains a SQL injection vulnerability that allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and exfiltrate data from the MOVEit database.
